Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful set once you get it adjusted.  As many of the reviewers, I was a little taken aback by the soap opra effect but with working through the adjustments it becomes the best tv picture I have ever seen.  I am using the HDMI cables with standard DVD's.I love this TV.. but adjustments are needed depending on what movie or TV show you are watching.  The formating on the TV is not a "one size fits all" thing at all... Trust me.  I used some of the adjustments listed by others here on Amazon and found that I liked them for certain movies.  I have to agree i do not like th Soap Opra affect very much and had to get away from it right away.  But when I would go to a different movie or TV show that was filmed in a very different lighting or set, I found I needed to adjust the color, temperature, back light, and contrast to name a few... Now I feel I have the best picture for me with these settings:Mode: StandardBacklighgt: 10Contrast: 50Brightness: 40Sharpness: 82Color: 40 Tint G/R: 60/40Advanced Settings:  * Color space: Native  * White Balance:  No Changes * color space: Native * White Balance:  ** No Change * Gamma: +2 * dynamic Contrast: High * Black Tone: Darker * Flesh Tone: +3 * Motion Lighting:  OffEco Solution: OffI hope this helps, and minor adjustments based on the lighting and cinima style of the movie may always be needed by this very sensitive set.  Good watching all :)

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Lalo
Reviews.Content: Amazing tv great picture ok sound not bad mount it in my room. When you get the tv the picture is on standard change it to dynamic for the full quality I dnt recommend to hav set on dynamic if you use it alot lik I do. And change the sound to movie. Would buy again

Reviews.Title: Top Notch
Reviews.Author: Caseysdad22
Reviews.Content: I was truly amazed with the picture and quality of this TV. The colors are vibrant with the animated movies and animated TV shows and really have that 'authentic' look with TV shows and movies. I have to admit that I had no idea how to set it and was about to spend $249 for a professional to come to do it. However, I found some settings online and they seem to work perfectly.Pros: Very realistic color. Easy to set up. Price was amazing.Cons: I honestly can't think of any to date.This is my first Samsung. I had another name brand, but it quickly began to get lines on the left side of the screen after the warranty was up, so it was time to get another. I decided to spend a little more and try Samsung. It was a wise choice.I've had this TV for 2 weeks and have enjoyed every minute of it.

Reviews.Title: First Flat Screen HD TV
Reviews.Author: Jean Magee
Reviews.Content: So far, I really like the TV.  I enjoy the picture.  The writing on this is very easy to read across the room.

Reviews.Title: worth every penny
Reviews.Author: web
Reviews.Content: Purchase one for my bedroom and was totally impressed! Will buy another for a different room in my home soon!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Sarah A. Ashton "sarah"
Reviews.Content: I'm not really a TV snob, but this TV is great. I can see it and hear it at all times of the day. The picture took a little time to get used to as I was used to an old tube TV- everything looked like a soap-opera- but I'm fully adjusted now and I love it. It was packed well and works great and easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Why pay more?
Reviews.Author: JOB
Reviews.Content: This tv is outstanding!  If you follow the settings recommendations of other reviewers (with a few personal preference tweaks) your picture should be beautiful and crystal clear.  I can't imagine a better picture from a sub $1000 tv.  Colors are great and there is no "ghosting" or blurring with the Clear Motion Plus.  If you're an audiophile you will need a sound system but for most people the sound should be fine.  I saved a bundle by buying a "used" one--all it had was a small scratch on the stand.  With my PS3 I didn't need the smart tv features so this one was perfect.  My only qualm is that the stand doesn't swivel.  If you don't need those extra features, you can't go wrong with this tv

Reviews.Title: Black Friday Purchase
Reviews.Author: JEREMY M LYNCH
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Samsung UN46EH6000 46-inch 1080p 120Hz LED HDTV from Amazon during a Black Friday sale in 2012. The order was successfully completed by Amazon, but the TV we received had a visual defect in it. The screen was damaged during delivery. Amazon immediately exchanged the TV promptly and curtiously. Amazon assisted us beyond our expectations. The second TV we received (of equal or closest to the original value) worked great for about 3 months, just beyond the Amazon warranty. Two pixel dots appeared in the center of the screen, and a gray spot appeared near the top right of the screen. After speaking with a representative at the local electronic retail store, with his 8 years of experience selling TV's, we were informed that electronics sold during Black Friday sales are manufactured with lesser care. The representative said many TV's are returned during these periods with defects, more than any other time of year.Beware of buying Black Friday electronics online.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the family room
Reviews.Author: John M. Tarpey
Reviews.Content: We use this TV in our family room and is the primary TV for our home.  Its very true to life and we enjoy watching it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: A. S. Montgomery "outdoors boy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this after Christmas and am very pleased with it's ease of operation, picture and sound quality.Cons: Volume doesn't go up very loud which if there is background noise can be an issue.

Reviews.Title: Great tv great price
Reviews.Author: doodlfrog
Reviews.Content: The tv arrived a day early and looks great. Beautiful picture for a great price. Though im starting to understand the term soap opera. Definatley a great buy. Im a big samsung fan and this is my first samsung tv. Looks great on blu rays and xbox. Cant wait for football season.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: jojo
Reviews.Content: great tv for my bedroom i like the sound and image is samsung quality so you cant go wrong when you get the best you expect the best and it  this tv is nothing short of a samsung

Reviews.Title: Very happy.
Reviews.Author: Victor L. Williams
Reviews.Content: Great set, excellent picture with just a little tinkering to meet our needs. Looks good in a bedroom corner which gets a lot of daylight. Beautifully replaced huge bulky 35"cathode ray set that gave me headaches after getting used to HD.

Reviews.Title: You will love this TV!!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Kavanagh
Reviews.Content: This TV is a huge bargain! I am incredibly happy with the purchase. The picture is insane! So crisp and clear. Movies in HD look like the actors are in my living room! Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Scott D Bell
Reviews.Content: Almost to good.  Ther is no comparing it to my LG that has the same stats.  I like to make small adjustments to picture to take away the "Soap Opera Effect".  It is amazing.  The sound is okay, but couple this Samsung to a surround sound system and you have your own Theater.  The slim bezel gives this set a great look.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable TV Quality - QuickList
Reviews.Author: Luke Jarrett ""J.R""
Reviews.Content: This by far is the best TV I have ever owned. I'll try to keep this review short, as there are plenty out there describing quality... If you only want to know main points so that you can buy this TV, here they are.+Amazing Quality. (1080p)+Blacks are so deep, I thought the TV was off sometimes.+Not Super Thin, but Thin.+Bright, with tons of settings for tweaking.+/- Sound isn't terrible. You can listen to the TV without external speakers, but they will help significantly.-Two HDMI ports.That's all I can think off.Do yourself a favor and buy this TV.

Reviews.Title: Lacks inputs
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: Was received with damaged LCD/LED screen.  Was quickly and professionally fixed under warranty with no problems.  While I can't complain too much because I bought it at a significantly reduced price, it lacks the inputs and flexibility I would expect from a device in its original price range.  I think I should have bought a smaller screen and got more input flexibility.  Picture excellent, I use home theater unit for sound.

Reviews.Title: Very Good HDTV
Reviews.Author: Alfredo Reyna
Reviews.Content: It's a greate TV.  very good definition the sound is great and for me se size was perfect, the only thing for i don't give 5 stars is becuase i have a Smartphone of the same Brand and this tv does not have the hability to use All Share !!

Reviews.Title: An excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Shirley Albanese
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this TV to Friends and family.  The picture is bright and clear.Sound is easily adjusted for someone who is slightly hard of hearing.I was surprised with the easy of delivery.

Reviews.Title: More than satisfied
Reviews.Author: GBark
Reviews.Content: My first flat-screen so my expectations were high. Still a winner. Easy set-up. If there's a complaint it's with Samsung/s remotes. Rounded bottoms can be a pain.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV while it lasted...
Reviews.Author: Ian Phillips
Reviews.Content: This is really an amazing TV for the price. Picture far exceeds that of any other television I've seen thus far. Only downside is reliability - TV randomly started cycling the power on and off while in use and almost 2 weeks into use, has quit turning on whatsoever, despite the red standby light still flashing. Would definitely recommend, hoping I'm just extremely unlucky.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Continues to be the Best
Reviews.Author: Joe F. Lowe "Lowe Jazz"
Reviews.Content: We now have three Samsung HDTVs in our home..... and love all three since the Samsung technology is second to none. Have all three consumer technologies they've used in the past decade: DLP, LCD & LED ....  and all three continue to provide great pictures ... in the case of the DLP, for over 10 years with zero problems.The latest is the 46" LED I just installed. First, the packaging was great and it arrived at our front door in pristine condition in perfect shape.... no dings, scratches, etc. Perfect.Lightweight and soooooo easy to get going. The picture was great out of the box so I did no tweaking. I'm a "tweaker" so this is unusual .... oh, maybe I changed the mode on a couple of screens, but nothing major or unusual.I bought this particular Samsung model because of the sound quality over other models and manufacturers. This model is used in our bedroom and I didn't want to have to use a receiver and speaker set up because of both appearance and space considerations. The sound is excellent for what we need which is mostly news, sports and talk shows. Not what you'd likely want for 5.1 quality for movies , etc., but very good.The speakers fire back into the rear wall and give a nice quality when they bounce audio back into the room.We have Direct TV, so getting the "Smart" model of this was not needed. We can connect the DVR to our home wi-fi network and get all the content we want.So, if you want high quality, nice sound, light weight and a great picture, go with Samsung for sure and take a peek at this model. It also comes in different screen sizes, so there's gotta be one that fits your eye.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Francisco Lira "@Ryoken99"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a basic HDTV. I just needed to hdmi inputs one for the PS3 which i use for bluerays and any streaming service and one for the cable box. i didnt want a "smart" hdtv bc i feel like there is more room for something to fail. the price was right here no thrills very few preset tv modes but this is exactly what i needed.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!
Reviews.Author: Jean328
Reviews.Content: The picture is awesome and very easy set up!!  I was able to put it together myself with no problems and set it up and I am not technologically advanced by any means.  I have a Sony Bluray wireless system that was easy to sync up with.  Happy with the options on it and I've had it for about 5 months now and have had no problems so far.  For the price it is a great buy!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item after doing a lot of research -- written reviews and owners.  This HDTV meets all of my expectations and is the envy of neighbors!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Giulia Gallo
Reviews.Content: I found everything really good, the video is great and veru very bright. only the sounds is not perfect .

Reviews.Title: Excellent Non-"Smart" TV
Reviews.Author: Stacy Pennington
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an inexpensive, high performance, decent build-quality television, one without all of the bells-and-whistles of a "smart TV," then the Samsung is an excellent choice. Be sure to turn off the energy saving feature, which is on by default, and you will experience a wonderful picture. The TV starts quickly and has worked flawlessly in the 6 weeks we've had it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Lynn Carter
Reviews.Content: Not only is the picture superb, the sound is better than my LG 37" by a large margin.  We use this set on our Lanai, and the picture is terrific in daylight (not direct sun) and dark. We are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Best TV Purchase Ever Made
Reviews.Author: Damon Warren
Reviews.Content: This tv purchase was made as a Christmas "gift" for myself. Easy to unpack and setup. Beautiful picture, nice sound, easy to understand menu. I could not be more pleased. A great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: So far, I'm impressed.  This TV sits in a pretty bright room on our main level and provides a great picture in both low light and high light.  Definitely a keeper.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: nicky
Reviews.Content: it is a very nice tv, especially for the price.  it is exactly what i wanted, no frills no fuss.  i do hope it has durability and longevity.  my last tv only lasted four or five years and it was smaller, costing twice as much as this samsung.  what worries me though is that there are no controls on the tv itself, only an on-off button.  whats up with that?

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I bought this on one of those "one day only price" deals.  After I did that, I felt I should have thought about it more.  Then I happened to be at a  Sams club, and saw that I paid 50.00 less, no sales tax,FREE shipping,  and they put it right inside my living room for me!  After a very simple hook up, I turned it on,  and I AM NOT SORRY NOW!  Wow,  what a great product.  It is so clear, wonderful picture.  Would tell friends and family.Karen

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: David C. Nutter "handelway"
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen TV and I'm amazed at the quality. Sure you have to get the settings just right but it's nice to have them. I copied them from some of the reviews on Amazon and it was easy.The sound is better than I expected. I would recommend this TV to anyone. I'm glad I had the sense to wait for the prices to go down.

Reviews.Title: rare problem
Reviews.Author: kevin hendrickson
Reviews.Content: Mine did not work properly.  I tryed to get the picture better by changing cables, sources and settings.  My tv just had a problem and the picture was fuzzy.  Samsung was not completely helpful.  Amazon was great and took it back with no questions.  I am pretty sure this was an isolated problem.  I will get a different samsung tv sometime.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Duke
Reviews.Content: Aside from the UPS tracking information being incorrect when it first shipped, I had no problems with the delivery, or how it arrived.  Works great, no problems.  The only down side is the small number of inputs, but I knew that going in, so doesn't deserve to lose a star for that.  Also, not Amazon's fault that UPS didn't process their tracking info properly, so doesn't deserve to lose a star for that either.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv
Reviews.Author: kerry robinson
Reviews.Content: Excellent shopping experience on Amazon, ordered tv and tv came to my home as said it would. Easy to set up with new Samsung Blueray with smart hub enjoying my new set up. Had a horrifying experience with Vizio and Wallmart. Thank you Samsung

Reviews.Title: Great picture with few frills at low price
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: This TV is a sweet spot: it has a really great picture from a stellar brand, efficient LEDs, easy menu, attractive design, and all at a super bargain price because you aren't paying for gimmicks like 3D, "Smart TV", a super slim profile, or modern art design.  Manufacturers use them to charge more as the basic technology is getting cheaper to produce, but they don't add nearly enough value to justify the cost: I don't like 3D at all, I get Smart features in other devices, I'm not wall-mounting, and it's the screen I'm staring at -- not the frame.Sidebar: LED was very important to me.  I don't care how deep the blacks are on Plasmas (BTW this TV has excellent blacks), they don't look good enough to justify the huge power consumption.  Just put your hand in front of a Plasma vs LED in a showroom and feel the heat difference.  Multiply that by how many hours you or your family have the thing running per day, week, year... it's just plain wasteful.I'm very happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, decent sound.
Reviews.Author: Maryellen Sheppard
Reviews.Content: I like the tv especially blu-ray disks. Excellent clarity and color. Set up was easy and the controls are simple to figure out. I connected the system to a Samsung home theater and it takes a bit to get used to having to use two remote to control channel and sound but once that's second nature the whole thing works great. No complaints. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding 46 inch LED TV perfect for those who already have SMART players
Reviews.Author: M. Weekley
Reviews.Content: There are hundreds of positive reviews for this TV so I'll keep my comments brief so you can focus your energy on the already well written helpful reviews out there.  In short, this is a perfect TV for those who already have a SMART device (PS3, Wii, Apple TV, Roku, etc.).  There really is no reason to spend more money for a SMART TV if you have one of the above.The picture is absolutely amazing.  I upgraded from a 37 inch LG LCD to a 46 inch LED model and it is beautiful.  I didn't think I'd see as big a difference moving from LCD to LED and from 60hZ to 120hZ but I did.  Blu rays are stunning and vibrant.  TV shows are wonderful too.The set comes with tons of features for total user customization.  I went off of the settings of the helpful reviews and tweaked to my preference.  I'm overall very happy.  I have my sound system plugged into it (a newer Yamaha model) and I've had no issues with it.We've all heard of the 'soap opera' affect as a result of the fluid motion and after making the adjustments from the helpful reviews above I feel I have a perfect balance.  When the camera moves a lot it can feel a tad jerky at times but I think it is more of our eyes getting used to a more accurate viewing experience.  Also the screen is matte finish, but it had more of a sheen than my previous LG model.  Minor issues for me though.In terms of complaints, the only one I can think of is I wish the base allowed for a small swivel.  I've heard complaints about the # of HDMI ports (2) but for me with having a sound system control my AV it is a non issue and I went into the purchase knowing that.If you're in the market for a new TV and don't need the SMART apps and want Samsung quality, I will say the 46 inch version is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: The best.
Reviews.Author: np
Reviews.Content: The picture on this tv is as sharp as can be.  It came with a HMI cable so I really didn't have to buy one!  I can extremely happy with this purchase and highly recommend it to others!

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Rhonyg
Reviews.Content: When I purchased this tv, I was looking for a smarttv, but I found this with 200$ discount, so I decided for this. At first I was regret but once I received it I figured out how great is this tv, Excellent Definition, Real Colors, Usb port (accept MKV), etc. I strongly recommend this tv if you don't care smartv thing at all or if you have an apple tv device or other like that.

Reviews.Title: 1st tv lasted a month
Reviews.Author: Robert Haley
Reviews.Content: The first TV i received only lasted about a month and then would not power up. I took it in for repair. Then it only worked 2 hours after repair.  I contacted Amazon.. They switched it out with a new replacement that same day and I got the new tv the very next day.. Now I've only had the new tv for a day but it seems much better this time around. I am very pleased with the customer service at Amazon.. Thanks..

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Anthony J Nicastro
Reviews.Content: I agree with the other reviewers - great picture for the price!  In fact, depending on the broadcast, sometimes I'm awestruck with the pictures compared to my other high-end LCD and Plasma flat screens tv.  Hawaii-5-0 was on the the other night, I don't watch the show but the picture quality of the high def signal was phenomenal.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: ch
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for a couple of months now. Picture quality is great. I was amazed how light the unit is. Won't be buying any more LCD products.

Reviews.Title: S
Reviews.Author: Susie Shawnego
Reviews.Content: The tv was beautiful and the size is correct for the area in my home. The picture quality is very clear and colorful.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: lou abbato
Reviews.Content: This unit is nothing short of outstanding and as it sits in your living room or wherever you have it in your house it seems to look better.The picture seems to adapt to the environmentI would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: 46 Inch 120Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Joseph M. Bruno
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews and went to a brick and mortar store for a visual inspection of this set. We've been very impressed and if the extra features (wireless; Net-Apps; etc) aren't high on your list highly recommended that you put this on the short list for purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv! Nice Picture
Reviews.Author: Amazon Fan
Reviews.Content: I'm loving this HDTV. At first I wasn't use to the more realistic feel of the image but now I'm hooked. I added a Samsung sound bar for greater volume, but I didn't even need it. If you live in an apartment or don't need surround sound, you will be fine with its speakers. It has 2 HDMI ports which I wish it had more but a switch box did the trick. I also wasn't looking for Smart features. I can always get them via a PS3 or a Blu-ray player. It's straight-forward for those of us who just want a nice HDTV to enjoy shows and movies. The price was also fantastic when I grabbed it for $599. It might've been a one day sale. Overall, it has a great picture and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted at a great price
Reviews.Author: Sean Sweeney
Reviews.Content: If you have another way to stream content (this TV does not have built-in internet) then this is great 46" model and the price point is tremendous.

Reviews.Title: This TV is the Bee's Knees
Reviews.Author: edu723
Reviews.Content: Amazing TV, great sounds, rich deep blacks (loading screens look like it's off), awesome refresh rate (I play Xbox a lot and for the moment the TV is ahead of the console graphics-wise).Lightweight and thing but doesn't turn over easy (this was a concern because I have cats).No cons so far (had it for about 2+ months).LPT: There is one reviewer who wrote down the settings to get the best colors. I followed those and it greatly improved what was already great. Find it!

Reviews.Title: Samsung purchase
Reviews.Author: Jodi Collins
Reviews.Content: I do like the TV don't get me wrong however for the price $685.00 I thought I would be blown away by it..This was my first HD TV and to tell you the truth it is not even as clear as my Mom's Vizio 4 year old HD TV which was 60 HZ and a heck of alot cheaper!so thats why I expected a sharper cleaner picture~ I love sports especially hockey and footbal..I got this in time for the Super Bowl and again it was fine but I expected to be blown away! I have DISH with HD for life and this was the first time I could see all the channels in HD..This TV was supposed to be a 120hz tv however when I turn it on it says 60 in the corner every time which REALLY bothers me as I paid for the 120hz..(60hz are ALOT less expensive)!!! The box and everything says 1080p 120HZ! I really would think again on spending this much on something that is barely noticeable! My advice get a cheaper TV , I think Vizio or LG are equally or better picture quality than the expensive Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Hard to rate this.
Reviews.Author: brianfssc
Reviews.Content: I say that because I had this tv for TWO days and the screen went blank when I changed the input to component for the first time. I do have to say that Samsung sent someone out the next and they replaced the entire panel which must be the way to fix flat screens these days. I'm holding my breath,  but so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Fit.
Reviews.Author: Stephen H. Gorden "S H Gorden"
Reviews.Content: Selected the unit because it was exactly what I needed; a great TV without a lot of the bells & whistles (and higher cost) many of the TV's come with these days. Based on recommendations from Consumer Reports, I already had a "smart" (web ready) Blu Ray player from Sony at a very reasonable price, so I didn't need to reproduce that capability. I settled on the Samsung UN46EH6000 because of it's high scores and size. It fit exactly the space available in my old component  audio cabinet along with a legacy stereo amplifier / receiver, CD player and the Blu Ray player. After adding a Fiio D3 digital to analog converter, I was able to use the amplifier to drive my existing external JBL speakers, giving a great sound. After installing the TV in the cabinet, that was a definite improvement over the internal speakers. Set up was a  snap, although there is a lot of tweaking that can be done to the picture if one is so inclined.All in all, the TV was a great value, delivering exactly what it promised, without adding (for me) unwanted expensive extras.

Reviews.Title: Great tv fantastic price......
Reviews.Author: talker
Reviews.Content: We are extremely happy with this purchase, and would highly recommend it. It was a great price and was  very easy to setup.

Reviews.Title: Great HD tv
Reviews.Author: Rose Skinner
Reviews.Content: Great HD tv right out of the box. Made one adjustment to the picture, went from standard to dynamic control.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: skipper1814
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV and a great value through Amazon. This is not a Smart or 3D TV. You can still stream Netflix movies on it by pairing it with a blu-ray player with wi-fi. We did not have HD when we purchased it, and I was disappointed in the picture. Once we connected HD, the picture was great. I tweaked the picture settings as advised from another Amazon reviewer. In looking at the displays in the stores, I thought the Samsungs had the best picture quality. I have friends that will not buy anything but a Sony, but I thought the Samsungs offered a much better value for the money. TV's have come down so far in price that it is affordable to buy a good name brand one vs the cheaper ones.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!!
Reviews.Author: jules
Reviews.Content: Great looking, excellent picture, true and vibrant colors.......did extensive comparing online and in stores and found this tv blows the others away! And as always, great service Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung t.v
Reviews.Author: Janice G. Brown
Reviews.Content: Great t,v for the money.The sound is good and the picture is great.It was shipped on time and easy to put together

Reviews.Title: Another Good Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Pearland Kathy
Reviews.Content: This TV has a very clear, crisp picture. I bought it for my husbands mancave. He loves it. We are considering buying another one for my study.

Reviews.Title: hd led tv
Reviews.Author: bsacamper73
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture and functionality. Like how easy it is to set up and start using, watching. Picture is incredibly crisp. Great deal!

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: J. Zackey "Birthday girl"
Reviews.Content: Great tv.  Picture is good.  Size is just right. Loved that it was shipped to the house. Great price Would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Love My LED
Reviews.Author: Man Cave
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd LED from Amazon. I just love this TV. It is so clear. Easy to set up. My husband was so surprised that I made this purchase. He is totally happy in his new Man Cave.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: AB
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because I heard that Samsung LEDs are great and this was a good deal.  It didn't disappoint!The picture looks great and it's very light to move around.

Reviews.Title: Picture is shockingly good.
Reviews.Author: Nathan
Reviews.Content: I don't need 10 HDMI ports - all I needed was a solid TV for my bedroom. This TV has the best picture of any TV I've ever seen. The Dynamic setting displays anything from blu rays to streaming Netflix flawlessly. Don't waste the $3-400 for the "Smart" version - buy this TV with a wi-fi blu ray player and you're good to go. I am impressed.

Reviews.Title: Meeting my expectations thus far.
Reviews.Author: Ryan R. Chand
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a stripped-down non-smart tv LED, and this tv fits the bill.  Hard to give an accurate reading since it hasn't been a month yet, but liking it so far.  Great pic and good sound.  Only drawbacks so far are the lack of a serial port, and only two HDMI inputs.  Other than that, pretty happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: John C. Ayers
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture, nice sound. Easy setup. No unnecessary extras - remote controls everything. Excellent value if you don't want 3D or internet capability (I get internet through my connected Bluray player). Also uses very little electricity.

Reviews.Title: Sharp picture, minimal bevel - it's a Samsung
Reviews.Author: Steve K
Reviews.Content: Impressive, light, minimal bevel, rich blacks, good/smooth motion, easy setup, lightweight, number of outputs with multi HDMI's (2 on back, 2 on side for easy access).  Not sure how the 120Hz processor impacts the picture yet, but I did seek out that feature when shopping for HDTV's.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I haven't had any issues with this beautiful tv. The only complaint is that it only has 2 hdmi ports.

Reviews.Title: What a great product!
Reviews.Author: Rosie
Reviews.Content: I love my new 46" Samsung TV.  I bought this along with the Samsung 5700 Smart Blu-Ray player.  It was more cost-effective than buying  a Smart TV.  I am so satisfied with this product.  I wish I could give it 10 stars.  The picture is fantastic!  The sound is great.  There are several sound settings and I think the sound can be adjusted to anyone's liking.  OK, it's not surround sound but, you know what, I'm happy with it.  JR Computers in New York, delivered it to me without shipping in TWO days!  I was astounded!  Thought it would take at least a week!Samsung--you did it again!  I don't think you could get a better HDTV than Samsung!!  If anyone's on the fence about this product, get it!!! You'll love it!

Reviews.Title: 46 inch led
Reviews.Author: TERRY BABB
Reviews.Content: my son was looking for a great tv and a great price i was looking for him a lcd tv because they have been cheaper than led but i found this one on amazon at a great price and it was a samsung led  46 inch so i ordered it for him it cam in and easy to set up he loves this tv great quailty good picture and the sound is wonderful again thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Great value.  Good picture.
Reviews.Author: Robert Hogan
Reviews.Content: The price was right for this TV.  $595.  It's a good picture, but the black levels are definitely not equal to similarly priced plasma panels.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality for sane price
Reviews.Author: Styler
Reviews.Content: You do need to think about external sound or sound bar at the minimum. 10W speakers are formal function, obviously. other than that, perfect value and combined with wi-fi or network enabled media player will beat smart TV in picture quality and overall money spent.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: wactech
Reviews.Content: Quick shipment  and a beautiful picture. I was very happy with the quality of the sound of the speakers. I will be getting a second one for the family room.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Papa
Reviews.Content: This Tv is fantastic!The color are so vivid and crisp, and if you are planning to play games with this TV then you are in for a treat. The only negative thing to say is that there is really not enough connectivity to plug everything you may own like several video game platforms or dvd players and also apple Tvs etc. Other than that, its an amazing TV. Must buy.

Reviews.Title: Great "Dumb" TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Brian S. Schatz
Reviews.Content: This is a great, no frills TV for the price.  I think I paid about $600 for it, and it pretty much has everything I need.  The input offerings are a little slim, but that can be fixed with a HDMI splitter or one of those 2.1 home theaters.  Sound output is respectable.  I had to turn down the judder on the clear motion settings to get rid of that super-smooth soap opera effect.  Once i did that, the picture was great.  I got my picture settings from CNET--mostly a tweaked "movie" mode.  You may think it looks a little too warm (yellow) but it's easy on the eyes and everything from live sporting events to Xbox 360 games look awesome.

Reviews.Title: Our first large screen tv
Reviews.Author: Catherine L. Servie
Reviews.Content: My husband and I are really enjoying this TV.  Great picture and sound.  It took us a while to find the on/ off button as it was hiding on the underside of the tv.  Once we located that button, everything was great.

Reviews.Title: great TV!
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: got this for $650 during black friday sales. No problems at all with the TV. It has a great picture and great sound (I prefer the movie-movie modes)

Reviews.Title: Amazingly clear
Reviews.Author: Ted Snell
Reviews.Content: This TV is almost too clear. You start noticing the fake backgrounds used in some of the movie scenes. It is almost 3d like. Could not be happier with the deal and quality.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Sadyhawke
Reviews.Content: The TV is awesome! The picture is like you are present. It is crystal clear! We love it. We will buy another one soon.

Reviews.Title: I love Samsung TVs!
Reviews.Author: Joshua Desjardins "Joshua Desjardins"
Reviews.Content: I will never steer away from a Samsung TV after my last 32-inch.  But this 46-inch takes the cake!  My only beef with the product is that it has only TWO HDMI outputs.  There's no reason for that.  I didn't want to spend the extra $100 or so for the smart TV because I use Apple TV and don't need my TV itself to be smart.  But these days, between video game systems and blue ray players and cable boxes, EVERY TV should have at least THREE HDMI outputs....

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Doctor Travis
Reviews.Content: the picture looks perfect on this tv.  opted for the 46 inch because i sit ten feet way and didn't want anything too big.  the only thing samsung needs to work on is the sound quality.  hook this up to a soundbar or decent sound system if you're an audiophile  :)

Reviews.Title: Good 120hz tv for fair price
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: Got this tv right after christmas and have been using it daily for the past couple weeks and so far so good.  No dead pixels or weird color formations.  The tv came with the box slightly crushed on one end but the tv itself seems ok for now.  Great to have gotten a 120hz led lit tv for good price.  I did make some adjustmensts to the display settings to my preferences but thats something everyone should do anyway.  Overall i am happy with the product and am surprised how much clearer it is than my previous 60hz 720p display.  Would def recommend

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: NarasiNara
Reviews.Content: Works as posted:)TV is clear. Audio also clear. Not too heavy not too light.HDMI & all works great.

Reviews.Title: had some initial problems setting it up, but looks great now...
Reviews.Author: Jennifer H
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this TV - it was not real easy to set it up, but once we got the resolution working properly, it looks awesome.  I love that it turns on very fast.  The only downside is my son doesn't like the slowness in changing channels.

Reviews.Title: Fast delivery, good product
Reviews.Author: Matthew S. Romelfanger
Reviews.Content: Ordered this to replace an older LG 32".  I like the TV.  The picture is good, but I'm having some difficulty getting it adjusted to exactly how I like it.  In all honesty, the picture on the old LG was better, though maybe it was just that I was used to it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: R. Dewey
Reviews.Content: The picture quality of this TV is great!  It's like it has dimension and it's not a 3D TV.  I would recommend to anyone looking for a great TV

Reviews.Title: Really Nice TV
Reviews.Author: John C
Reviews.Content: I'm a tech guy. I have very specific needs in my gear. This TV is the best that I could afford. If money wasn't an issue I may have gone to the next size up, and I may have chosen the "smart TV" version- but I already have that through my blu-ray player. I wouldn't have gone too much bigger, as 1080p is the max resolution right now, and when you view that on an extremely large Screen there can be distortion and lack of clarity. In the near future they will be releasing units with much higher definition, when that happens huge TVs will be ideal, but for right now I find that 47" is an ideal size.The one drawback with his TV is the "standard" or default LED settings; the image and refresh rate is SO clear that it makes regular television look crazy; like ultra-sharp live video. You'll need to spend a bit of time calibrating your new TV to find the visual "sweet spot".Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: A. KOWALSKI "electronic man"
Reviews.Content: best picture I have ever seen. Setup was very quick and easy!!!!!!! Arrived ahead of time and was well packed so no damage could happen in shipment!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice!!
Reviews.Author: fjn3
Reviews.Content: T have found this TV to be a good replacement to my old 36" tv. picture is good sound is good for a flat panel tv. I would recommend a sound bar for watching movies. I would buy this TV again.Yes it only has 2 HDMI ports but you could always buy an HDMi expander, not a problem.http://www.amazon.com/HDMI-1-Out-Auto-Switch-Cable/dp/B0018DQYQ2/ref=sr_1_1?s=electronics&ie;=UTF8&qid;=1357474356&sr;=1-1&keywords;=hdmi+expander

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: J. Bell "Tech Junkie"
Reviews.Content: Did my research and this was the best TV for my needs.  Was also looking at Panasonic, but the Samsung seems to have the truest colors.  Sound quality is pretty good through the TV speakers if needed.  I use an eternal sound system.  Happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Peggy Sullivan Crespo "peggypepsi"
Reviews.Content: Arrived very fast - think it was next day or two day. Very good picture and great price.  Samsung is a good tv.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Spillman
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy.  The picture is wonderful.  Definitely a good product.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a new tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: LucWyrmwood
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this LED. It is amazing, the picture is great, and even without a sound bar the sound was good. With a sound bar, it is incredible.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Shteve
Reviews.Content: Only my 2nd flat screen; Picture beautiful, happy w/presets. Tuner pulled in 3 times as many channels off air than last TV- didn't think timers varied so much.

Reviews.Title: Looks great
Reviews.Author: justin jones
Reviews.Content: I got this tv 2 weeks ago and it looks beautiful.  The speakers could be a little better, but the picture is amazing

Reviews.Title: Awesome Picture
Reviews.Author: John callagy
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with the TV, The picture is crystal clear, the refresh rate is awesome. For the money one of the best TV's I have seen on the market would strongly recommend this tv

Reviews.Title: Sound quality is excellent
Reviews.Author: JCA
Reviews.Content: Since my hearing is "waning" and I haven't submitted to hearing aids yet, I needed a TV that had good sound quality and clarity without having to turn up the volume.  This TV is the best!!

Reviews.Title: We love this LED tv!
Reviews.Author: Busy Grandma
Reviews.Content: This tv is all that I expected it would be.  Nice clear picture which is a delight to the eyes and  having the large 46" screen is especially  great!

Reviews.Title: Samsung products satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Eugene Elcik
Reviews.Content: High Definition TV 46" present the quality I look for in a TV.  I would recommend this TV to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: Samsung is a very reliable television.  We own a LED, LCD, and Plasma.  All 3 are excellent and we have nothing bad to say about any of them!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my second HDTV but the first that I have actually viewed HD content on. All I can say is that it works great and the picture is incredible. Amazon had it at a very good special price and I do not regret purchasing it at all.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG 46" The Bomb
Reviews.Author: Sandy Nyquist
Reviews.Content: It's almost scary how clear the picture is. All shows look like they are taking place in the next room. Stayed at the Modern in Honolulu where they had this brand and were amazed. Definitely a SAMSUNG  LED fan.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!!
Reviews.Author: Andrew Ramallo
Reviews.Content: Exactly what i was looking for. Grade A++ Customer Service & Shipping. No Hassles at all. Would shop here again & again !!! This TV is amazing for the price I couldn't find anything running at 240hz at this size & at such a GREAT price. Only issue would be that there are ONLY 2 HDMI connections.

Reviews.Title: Great! Picture
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Purchased 46 inch BASIC TV for 90 yr old father. Easy to use and navigate after initial set up that took some time due to the need to call cable co to have box activated on their system. The default settings are actually quite good for our purpose. Will add a sound bar but the sound is not as bad as some indicate. Amazon has honored price guarantee as promised getting cost to under $700. Ordering another for bedroom soon.

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift
Reviews.Author: JA "Retired & Adapting"
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived in 2 days! It was just what I expected, 4 happy grandkids. The price was good, quality as indicated.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Helaine B. Thompson
Reviews.Content: The picture is great and it was super easy to set up. Exactly what we were looking for. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the money, excellent packaging by Amazon
Reviews.Author: J. D. Beischel
Reviews.Content: First, I was a little concerned about ordering a big HDTV from Amazon. I read other reviews about the units being damaged in shipment. However, I ordered this based on reviews here and on Consumer Reports. I usually would have made the purchase at our local Best Buy or HH Gregg, but HH Gregg did not have a sale item on display for me to see and I did not have any reviews to go by. Same day visit to Best Buy and no one would help me. So I thought I would just read reviews and try Amazon.The unit arrived the next day as I used one day shipping. It was WELL packed for shipping as it was packed in another box with plenty of packaging around it. Very impressed and no damage.The picture is good. I wish it had more HDMI ports, but one for the cable box and one for the Apple TV. I guess if I needed another port, I would just get an HDMI switch.Audio is very good. Loud and clear and does not sound tinny or bassy at all.Color is good. Very easy to operate.I have tried it with basketball and football games and all display the action well on this model.I also bought the Square Trade warranty for four years.In summary, very easy transaction, delivered to the door. Easy set-up, good picture. Very happy so far.

Reviews.Title: 2012: A digital Odyssey
Reviews.Author: S. Payne
Reviews.Content: Ripped myself out of the 90s and upgraded from a CRT TV to this. I'm glad I did.One of the first things I noticed is blacks are truly black. The appearance of movies is much more dramatic, more like directors imagined, I imagine.The other thing I noticed is the higher definition results in a loss of some movie mystery; Motion Pictures become actors on a set with special effects. It's quite unsettling, but after a couple of weeks this effect wore off. When I go back to viewing the same media in standard def on the old CRT TV that now annoys me. There has been some chatter in reviews and bulletin boards about "soap opera effect" that I think refers to this. I haven't played with settings enough to know if this is alleviated through some other processing mode. But my brain has adjusted fine, so why bother?I did find that I had to upgrade other components besides my brain:My 4 year old "upconverting 1080p standard def DVD player" played standard def DVDs horribly. It wound up with the old TV in spare bedroom. A new Samsung blu-ray player made my old DVDs look much better and the blu-ray discs are not bad either :) Samsung BD-E5300 Blu-ray Disc Player (Black).My 1st generation Roku box would not process Dolby Digital Plus 5.1 signals from Netflix, so this had to go to the room of shame with the old TV, and this one took its place: Roku 2 XS 1080p Streaming PlayerBut then my older Sony receiver could not process anything but original Dolby Digital so it got banished to the shelf of shame in the basement along with the Sony VCR that went years ago. It got replaced with this: Onkyo HT-RC430 5.1-Channel Home Theater Receiver (Black).So the moral is, if you upgrade your TV chances are you'll follow it soon with other components. Beware.I also splurged and parked a Windows 8 PC next to the TV for those times when you really want to surf the web but don't want to sit in front of a computer monitor. It plays well with the TV too; the Samsung has settings to be computer compatible. (just don't try to make it a blu-ray media PC; that's not worth the effort, sigh).Oh and the TV's speakers do a fine job, plenty of volume, but a lot of bass overwhelms the cabinet's ability not to buzz; an external sound system / speakers are going to be needed except for "casual" viewing.

Reviews.Title: Great Non-Smart TV
Reviews.Author: J-Bar
Reviews.Content: This is a great HDTV if your looking for one without internet or fancy features.  Like other posters said....its a great HDTV and if that's all you need then go for it.  The picture takes a little tweaking but the picture is great!The only downside I have is that it only has 2 HDMI slots but I already knew that before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Douglas A. Smith "Doug"
Reviews.Content: The tv produces an excellent picture. The sound is ok but I have added a sound system. This is not a smart tv but I have a smart blue ray player to fill that role. It could have additional inputs (only 2 hdmi and one shared composite/component) but my blue ray player fills that role too. I am very happy with the tv

Reviews.Title: Good value Samsung LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: David Michael Cook DDS
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN46EH6000:  Picture was way too bright out of the box.  Images of people with white shirts on against light background were washed out.  Good to excellent picture after manual adjustment.  Color adjustment Blue Ray DVD would probably make adjustment easier.  The only negative I have noticed is slight vignetting at corners with light backgrounds.  Not a big concern for me but could bother some.

Reviews.Title: Very nice tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe P
Reviews.Content: My wife and I recently started looking around for a tv to replace our old dinosaur of a rear projector flat screen,  after looking around for a while for something that would fit in the budget with our newborn son we settled on this 46" Samsung.  I was worried when amazon had pulled this item due to too many complaints but ours arrived yesterday after ordering on Friday with 2 day amazon prime shipping.  After unboxing and setting it up with my stereo system, and fiddling with all the settings to get rid of the "reality" look I have to say I'm very pleased with our purchase so far.  The picture quality is good for the price and I'm happy with the backlit led system,  the motion blur is iffy and the only reason I'm 4staring this review,  my wife doesn't notice it but I can during high movement scenes with the camera panning.  Overall if your on a budget or need a 2nd tv under a grand I think this is a good value.P.S.  I only need 2 HDMIs for my setup and didn't want a smart tv.  I also hang and set up theater systems specializing over fireplaces/mantels for a few of the homeowners for our residential remodeling business and have seen my fair share of HDTVs over the past few years,  I wouldn't say I'm a professional but I do know my way around the back of a system

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: cascdav
Reviews.Content: After exhaustive research and scanning of reviews, we decided to purchase the  Samsung UN46EH6000 46-Inch 1080p 240 CMR LED HDTV. I owned a Panasonic plasma for 7 years and although this is a very good TV, the Samsung is outstanding. The picture is bright, clear and has a 3D quality to it although it is not 3D enabled. Cost was a factor in our decision, based on the price paid (mid $700s) it was a great deal and serves our needs w/o expensive add ons I do not need or want to pay for. I highly recommend this TV

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46EH6000 HDTV
Reviews.Author: Fran
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these TV's from Amazon for a new home we just bought.  Completely satisfied with all aspects of them.  Great picture, good sound easy to mount (wall mounted one of the units). As expected, delivery was very prompt and all aspects of the purchase was typical of my high expectations of Amazon. I would recommend this TV to all.

Reviews.Title: Stunning picture quality; every thing else a-OK too
Reviews.Author: Cynesige
Reviews.Content: The Samsung UNHE6000 is one beautiful TV set.  You would be hard pressed to find ANY other set with a better picture quality.  This is the full monty, 1080 HD on an LED screen with 120hz refresh.  Very up to date technology and specifications, and it shows.  Sure, you can get a 240hz refresh now if  you're willing to pay more for it, but I'm not sure the difference between 120 and 240 can easily be seen on an everyday basis.  Now, could you spend 5 times more than this to buy a 60" designer TV that'll put this one to shame on every level, including picture?  Yeah, I guess you could.  But in the normal world of $1,000 to $2,500 sets which most of us inhabit, this model, which is not even a full $K, holds its own against any competitive product.I use the Samsung in my basement, for xBox and some other stuff.  I have absolutely no need for the extra software and capabilities that bulk up its Samsung (and other brands) siblings to $1300 or more - smart TV, wifi TV, 3D TV.  I don't want a 3D TV set (not yet, anyway) and all the "smart TV" stuff seems extraneous.  Nearly everyone's got something hooked up to their computer that'll provide all the wifi/web/social networking functions, so what is the point of having them in the TV?  Personally, I'd rather have a clean TV without all that cr*p -- save the money, and keep the internal guts free of bloatware.And thus, we get to the crux of the matter.  If you, as I, see the TV as basically a monitor into which you'll plug some different content sources such as cable, xBox, disc players, etc., well, there is probably no equal to the Samsung for quality and price point.  If you want all the extra stuff -- smart TV stuff or 3D -- then this isn't the box for you.  Keep in mind those extras are not a "few" bucks - they add hundreds and hundreds of dollars to the purchase.My one complaint is that it really could've used another hdmi port or 2.  2 hdmi ports is disappointing.  I won't dock them a star for it, but I think it would've been better and made more sense to give us another couple of ports.The sound is surprisingly decent.  I am very picky about sound, and will soon supplement it with a full home theater audio system, but if I had to live with the stock internal sound system, I could do so.  It's really not bad, and someone without budget for a nice sound bar or other system could easily make do with the included audio components.  That said, of COURSE adding a nice sound bar will significantly improve the audio.The 46" is a nice size.  We looked at the 55" and decided we just didn't need it.  Maybe it'd have been different if this was the set in our main living room area.  The 46" is not huge, but not small either.  Going with the 46" saves a lot of money, and some space too, and is easy to move around and light-weighted.  There's no way I could've been happy with a 40" or 42" set.  The 46" is a good mid-sized product.

Reviews.Title: Very high quality
Reviews.Author: tonopah1234
Reviews.Content: Very high quality picture, and sound.  Connections on the rear of the TV are easy to access, along with the two HDMI ports.

Reviews.Title: 2 (count 'em) HDMI ports
Reviews.Author: The Bernmeister
Reviews.Content: I'll grant you, this TV has a great picture and good sound. But, heh, this isn't 2007, and we expect that level of quality nowadays.This thing lists for about one grand, and Samsung will only give you two HDMI ports. So, trying to swap my 2008 46" Samsung (which has the faulty capacitors) with this model won't work, since I need 4 ports, not 2.The power cord's too short. There's no screen (that I've found, at least) which tells the current firmware revision. You have to download the latest off the Internet, load it into onto a USB drive, plug it in, then wait for the TV to tell you that your firmware is already up to date--all this to find out if your f/w is up to date.Once again, the antenna signal strength meter is buried I can't remember how many menus in the last place you'd look. And when you change channels, the meter goes away, and you have to push-push-push to get to it again. I'm supposed to use this?FYI...I just hooked up a Panasonic DMP-BDT20P blu-ray player, and it the screen gets shrunk width-wise to 4:9 no matter what I do on the blu-ray player. To fix this, I have to name the TV's HDMI input to "PC". I'm guessing the problem's with the blu-ray player. My older Panasonic worked just fine.

Reviews.Title: Do not Buy SAMSUNG!
Reviews.Author: Just Sayin'
Reviews.Content: *****W A R N I N G*****Do not buy SAMSUNG Televisions!!!  After the one year warranty period SAMSUNG Television screens tend to show burn-in and ghosting with horizontal lines, along with very heavy distortion of picture on right side side of screen.  This problem is systemic in all their LCD's and LED's.  Consumer's have complained all over the internet.  There are even numerous Youtube postings with the exact same problems in my DEFECTIVE SAMSUNG model, as well as other models.  This defect occurs on start-up and lasts for the first 15 minutes of trying to view a program. Then the picture progressively declines.I tried SAMSUNG's Executive Customer Relations Dept. and was told:  "We will do nothing but refer you to a local Authorized Repair Shop."  They were downright blunt and rude to boot!  I feel robbed of $2,900.00The repair will consist of a diagnosis visit, and then another visit to install a replacement "Panel"......all told, another $1,000.00SAMSUNG customer service also told me that their Televisions depreciate at 20% per year.

Reviews.Title: Just love, love, love the picture!
Reviews.Author: Carol A.
Reviews.Content: Did a lot of reading on TV's before this purchase, and am so happy I ended up with this 46-inch Samsung.  The picture is awesome, and everyone who comes in my house tells me how crisp and clear it is to them.  Also, kudos to the Amazon people for their 30-day support.  I called when first taking out of the box......and the gentleman I spoke with stayed right with me until the stand was put together, the TV on it and the picture and cable all adjusted.  I definitely would recommend......especially with the great service from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Fabulous
Reviews.Author: karmatic living
Reviews.Content: We are very impressed with the HD resolution and the beauty of this machine. We are enjoying our movie nights a whole lot more now!

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Marna Redding
Reviews.Content: We finally joined the 21st Century and bought this gorgeous tv for an amazing after Christmas price of $579 ~ we received the tv at our door at 7:45 p.m., unpacked it, had it all plugged in and watching tv by 8:15 p.m. Its amazing. The picture is beyond perfect. We did get a sound bar for it, which has not yet arrived, and I am not sure we will really need it. THe sound is just right for our room when we selected the movie mode. All in all, we could not beat the price and we upgraded from a 2002 Sanyo! :) We won't be leaving our couch all weekend!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Excellent deal!
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I finally upgraded to a flat screen LED/HDTV and I could not be happier with my purchase. The TV has a great picture and many little extras all at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: LINNEY
Reviews.Content: This is my first big screen TV, I love everything about it, great size for me and a beautiful picture. I did adjust the picture to my liking after reading other reveiws on this model I decided to to try it it was very easy and the picture is perfect.

Reviews.Title: this tv is sweet
Reviews.Author: Mavrick Ramlakhan
Reviews.Content: the picture quality is unbeatable one of the best that i have ever seen friends saw this tv and were just blown away with the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent basic TV
Reviews.Author: akreader
Reviews.Content: I got this TV during Black Friday in the 46" size, and could not be more happy with my purchase.  The picture quality is very good AFTER some tweaking (note: you must, I repeat, MUST calibrate the picture on this TV or you will not be happy with it).  It's got all the basic features I could want without unnecessary stuff like 3D and smart features.  3D TV might be awesome in the future but right now the content just isn't there.  I looked at some "smart" TVs and their apps stink--much, much worse than what you can get with a Roku or Apple TV.I really liked the design of this TV as well. The slim bezel is great--very sleek and modern looking.  It is deeper than the super-slim models that are becoming all the rage. This is not an issue for me as I have in on the stand, but if you are looking to wall-mount your TV you may want to consider whether a slimmer TV is better for you.120 HZ is great. This TV handles motion pretty well, at least for my purposes (I am not a gamer, so I can't comment on that).  It's got a bunch of motion-smoothing features, but I ended up turning most of them off as they can make the picture look really weird.Sound is very good for an LED TV.  I'm planning on adding a soundbar at some point, but you can definitely get by with the TV speakers.The only downside to this TV is that I initially noticed some dark shadows around the corners during some scenes (especially when the screen was all one color).  I think this is called vignetting or shadowing, and from what I can gather it is prevalent on backlit TVs that aren't full array (full array TVs are much more expensive).  Edge-lit TVs don't usually have this issue but they can have a bunch of other issues instead. At any rate, either the shadowing/vignetting problem improved or I just got used to it, because I hardly notice it at all anymore.There are a few other models out there that you should consider if you're looking at this TV right now.  The ES6003 model seems to have similar technical specifications, but it is super-thin and edge-lit. It would probably look much better wall-mounted than the EH6000, but I didn't want an edge-lit TV (they seem to have more uniformity issues than backlit TVs).  The EH6030 model is supposed to be exactly the same as the EH6000, but with 3D. I almost went with the 6030 since the price was similar, but bottom-line I am just not interested in 3D and wanted to make sure I wasn't getting some gimicky lower-quality TV. I have no solid reason for thinking it's lower quality though, so I'd recommend considering the EH6030 as well as this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV purchased for Black Friday!
Reviews.Author: Gregory Haney
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a 42" LG, and this TV is great out of the box, and fantastic after time spent adjusting the advanced picture settings! While this tv lacks any sort of advanced features, the bare-bones unit suits exactly what I needed it for: quality screen viewing.After playing with various data points and adjustments, I decided upon the following picture settings with the intention of mainly watching movies and network tv shows. Again, this is what worked best for me, I strongly encourage you to use these settings perhaps as a starting point and then adjust to your own personal contentment. (Note: I myself started with the settings provided by Jason in an earlier review and fine-tuned for my preferences.)1. PICTUREMode: StandardBacklight: 15Contrast: 75Brightness: 40Sharpness: 30Color: 40Tint: G50/R501A. ADVANCED SETTINGSColor Space: AutoGamma: 0Dynamic Contrast: LowBlack Tone: DarkFlesh Tone: +4Motion Lighting: Off1B. WHITE BALANCER-Offset: 20G-Offset: 30B-Offset: 20R-Gain: 25G-Gain: 25B-Gain: 301C. PICTURE OPTIONSColor Tone: StandardSize: Screen 16:9Digital Noise Filter: OffHDMI Black Level: LowFilm Mode: OffLED Motion Plus: On1D. AUTO MOTION PLUSAuto Motion Plus: CustomBlur Reduction: 7Judder Reduction: 52. SOUNDMode: StandardSRS TruSurround HD: OffAuto Volume: Off2A. EQUALIZER100Hz: Two notches down from highest "+" setting.300Hz: All the way to "+" setting.1KHz: Two notches down from highest "+" setting.3KHz: All the way to "+" setting.10KHz: All the way to "+" setting.3. GAME MODE: Off

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: Frances Cooney
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Great price. Great product. It was just as I expected. Arrived on time. I would buy it again without question.

Reviews.Title: Bought for my mom
Reviews.Author: Orlando Echeverria
Reviews.Content: Great TV!!!!Pros:Samsung LEDLEDPicture QualityPriceFeaturesFunctionsSizeCONS:Thickness of LEDNot ULTRA Slim LED

Reviews.Title: Would Buy this TV again in a second!
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: Love the picture and the sound.  I read the reviews here and elsewhere.  Samsung is hard to beat. Product came packaged well and was easy to set up.  Remote is a little small compared to the last Samsung I had.

Reviews.Title: Larry
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: The best tv I have ever purchased. I am completely satisfied with this product. Thought I would need a sound bar, but the sound is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Love our Samsung LED TV
Reviews.Author: momofthree
Reviews.Content: We already owned a Samsung and loved it.  It was an LCD that was only 1 year old when our 4yr old threw a remote at the screen and broke it...ouch!  After finding out it would be better to buy new vs. repairing the broken one, we didn't hesitate at all.  We knew we would be buying a Samsung again.  The picture is amazing and friends are always commenting how our picture is more clear than their flatscreen.  Hopefully, this one lasts longer than the 1st.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Samirs
Reviews.Content: Tv arrived on same day promised which was ver critical.  Packaging was great with no dents or scratches.  The picture on this tv is great the only thing I would have preferred if the base could swivel.  Great for the money.

Reviews.Title: VERY SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: bruce
Reviews.Content: Had this TV for one month and I'm VERY SATISFIED.After researching many makes and models in the same size class 46", I decided on the Samsung UN46EH6000.Bought it for $597; this is a good TV for the price.  The majority of the reviews I read cited the few connectors, remote with close buttons, poor manual, poor sound and a stand that does not swivel as cons; but these are all petty things compared to the good performance of this TV and the sound is fine in my opinion.  If you want a TV in this size class without Web browsing or 3D you will not go wrong with this Samsung

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LED TV
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: Had to rewturn the first Samsung TV due to half circle dark shadows in the picture.  Samsung immediately agreed to the return and Amazon was great during the returning process.

Reviews.Title: Constant Vibrating plastic noise
Reviews.Author: curious
Reviews.Content: I have been thoroughly disappointed by this TV. When I raise the volume above 15 - there is a constant vibrating noise. This is due to the plastic at the back hitting something inside the TV. When I press the back tightly the noise stops coming. The noise is soo loud that I can hear it almost louder than the TV programme being played.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Phoenix14830
Reviews.Content: This is a good TV, though I wish it had three HDMI plugs instead of two. It was a solid investment so far.

Reviews.Title: Great Television
Reviews.Author: K. Smith
Reviews.Content: Breaking Bad is a lot better when watching it on this TV.  It shows clearly with the factory settings.  I mulled this purchase for months before deciding to go with it.  I use it in conjunction with Apple TV and it is GREAT.  I don't have cable, so I'm not sure how shows with HD channels.

Reviews.Title: Good HDTV for small livingroom
Reviews.Author: Oleksiy
Reviews.Content: This TV has good picture and lightweight. No extra features like SmartTV or 3D. Good choice if you don't need these features like me. Be cautious ordering "Used - like new". I did that and received TV with broken glass. Thanks to Amazon generous return policy got my money back. Ordered same in "used - like new" condition. However it's nowhere like described. I found cracks on all 4 corners ! But screen is fine. TV works fine. I was just bit angry seeing these cracks on item which described as "used-like new".

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: styper28
Reviews.Content: It is a good tv, but it looks too big for the space i need it in.  I am still having problems figuring out the settings!!

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: John R. Valko "Taxx Mann"
Reviews.Content: This is the best TV I have ever owned. I bought an extra one for another room and can't wait to get it up and watch it.

Reviews.Title: Delightful!
Reviews.Author: Helen Marie
Reviews.Content: I finally upgraded from my Sony Wega Trinitron 29" TV.  I am perfectly happy with my choice.  This TV is perfect for me.  I set it up for my viewing taste and I am in heaven.  I do not want to leave my couch!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: For the price that it is listed at, this 46 inch looks beautiful. Television, Blu Ray, and PS3 all look beautiful on it, and there are a couple modes to choose from depending on your light source. Recommend.

Reviews.Title: Stunning picture.
Reviews.Author: Erol Denizkurt
Reviews.Content: Looks and sounds great. I find Samsung to be one of the best TVs on the market. Won't buy anything else.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Tracy N. Willoughby "Synicalchick"
Reviews.Content: We really LOVE our TV.  We have had it for a few months now and are very happy with it.  We had a cheaper piece 'o crap that was a "To good to be true deal" from a large retailer and we just thought the picture on that one was great before it crapped out on us 3 months later.  I was determined to replace it with one that was awesome.  The sound was our first test because the cheaper one.. the sound was... horrid.  You couldn't hear it without it being hooked up to speakers.  This one.. we don't even use the speaker system now unless we are watching a major action movie.In the wise words of Phil from Duck Dynesty... we are "HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY"  ::THUMB UP::

Reviews.Title: very nice picture
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Love the tv. I don't really care for the auto-motion plus picture setting for movies, makes it looks like your viewing a home video. But it looks good for sporting events. Overall I am very satisified and would recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great value, great brand
Reviews.Author: H.K.
Reviews.Content: Shipped quickly and arrived when expected. Took it out of the box and set it up very easily to our cable and we were watching TV in no time - good TV quality good size. Only minor thing is that we didn't read the specifications and the TV was a little thicker in the back than we expected for a Samsung LED TV, and it doesn't swivel like the other Samsungs we own. Again, very minor detail, but will be sure to read all specs going forward.

Reviews.Title: My thoughts
Reviews.Author: Ken McKinley
Reviews.Content: The TV is OK, but it only has 2 HDMI ports.  The day after I bought this, I found the same brand, size, etc. with three HDMI ports for the same price.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: KeyserSose "Keyser Sose"
Reviews.Content: I don't need more than 2 HDMI ports or a much bigger TV. So this fit my needs perfectly. It is a good TV, good image, good sound. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: W0W Really Nice HDTV with GR8 Picture!
Reviews.Author: vettes4us
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Samsung on an Amazon.com value thru email offer & gave alot of thought about purchasing a large item like this from the internet, shipping was very quick and recieved the item in 3 days without incident. When installed I couldn't believe how clear the picture was, I also own a Samsung 55LCD & it also plays well. Thumbs up so far!

Reviews.Title: Samsung is to be commended! Awesome upgrade to HD with little expense.
Reviews.Author: retired teacher
Reviews.Content: It was a treat to spend the time to hook up this TV and realize what a superb job Samsung has done allowing so many options.  I was able to get top quality stereo sound using our 9-year-old receiver/amplifier and DVD player.  Digital audio connections I used are a toslink cable from the TV  and an optical coax from the DVD.  A real bonus was finally finding a stereo jack on the back of the new TV which allows us to use our favorite wireless headphones, this after I had spent hours trying other options on the receiver/amplifier and visiting a name brand retail store that suggested a new receiver.  The HD picture is a treat although I had to adjust my 'favorite channel list' to the HD version channels to take advantage of this.  This purchase was worth it for just the TV, but we also have the ability to download Amazon movies (and many others) using an HDMI-DVI cord to our almost 5-year old MacBook Pro laptop.  Amazon shipped all the cords we needed very quickly.  We have not needed to use Samsung's free 30-day tech support by phone or internet.  We registered online and Samsung added 3 extra months to the 1-year warranty.  We have only positive feedback for Samsung and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Matthew J. Piazza
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is outstanding and it's slim profile is such a plus.  The menus are easy to follow and it's an all round television for the money.  Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: L. Brantley "Dog Lover"
Reviews.Content: We love our new Tv. It has a wonderful picture and sound. Would recomend it to our friends and relatives.

Reviews.Title: My Sumsung Success
Reviews.Author: Lucille Warren
Reviews.Content: My vision is diminishing due to my age.  So I looked around for a larger TV to put in my family room.  After shopping around in a few stores, I found that the TV models I chose from the floor were not available, sold out, or "on order."  So I looked into my favorite place to shop---Amazon.  I found this 46-inch Samsung TV at a good price.  It was available and was delivered in a couple of days.  The Samsung TV is just great.  It's large, bright, clear, and I am able to see the pictures very well.  Once again, thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46EH6000 46-Inch Perfect for me! Great Picture Quality!
Reviews.Author: Geetha (MA, USA)
Reviews.Content: We got this TV from Amazon for Thanks Giving for just $648. After opening the box with lots of expectations... found that there were some markings on the screen, informed to Amazon and they were so kind to send another one. Very next day Amazon shipped me another one and that was perfect. Very easy to setup. Just 10 mins after the shipment reached our home, we were able to watch online movies from Amazon and play video games. Great video quality! Real value for the money!!

Reviews.Title: Stunning Picture
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: very happy with this purchase. Quick delivery, easy setup. Connected to a panasonic DMP-BDT220 Blueray with wireless, after entering my networking info, had Netflix running in 3 minutes. And it looks beautiful. At night i cut lights down, and it seems the display doubles in size. In switching formats, i have seen the resolution seem grainy until the connection catches up, or maybe until it finishes drawing the screen, but that clears quickly. Sound is adequate too, but with such a beautiful and large screen you will want your sound to be expansive too.I would consider buying another.

Reviews.Title: Great set
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Other than adjusting the initial picture settings, this TV is phenomenal quality for the money. Once some of the settings are adjusted the picture is stunning, and the relatively thin bezel give the TV great aesthetic value.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Wild Bill "Mr. Bill"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for our family room because I had purchased a smaller LCD by Samsung for our bedroom a couple of years ago and have been very happy with that purchase.  This new TV has a great picture and I was surprised at the quality of the sound.  It also looks good in the room.  We have never had issues with any Samsung products we have purchased in the past.

Reviews.Title: You will not be disappointed...
Reviews.Author: Perry1945
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen purchase and I simply love it. Great picture easy setup, Playing regular DVD'sthe picture in fantastic, I have tweaked the picture some for my own taste. The picture is almost too good, great color, contrast couldn't ask for anything better. As far as the two HDMI connections, no problem running everything thru my receiver, didn't you know what you were buying??? TV speakers do a good job if you want honest surround sound, buy a good receiver and speakers...I have looked at many different LED TV's the last year (job related) and I don't think I could have made a better purchase, very pleased...

Reviews.Title: Great entry-level LED...but beware only 2 HDMI ports
Reviews.Author: Stan L
Reviews.Content: I have only had this unit for a couple of weeks, but so far, so good. I say entry-level because this unit does not support a lot of periphirals and is not an "Internet" TV. That said, it is exactly what I was looking for and a good compromise on price and picture quality. (I did have to purchase a Kinivo 301BN HDMI switch to allow support for Satellite box, Roku box and DVD, but it's more cost effective to do that than to buy a more expensive TV that has features I did not want.)The picture out of the box is shockingly brilliant (I'm coming from a 46" LCD) and needed to be toned down a bit for my taste. Another reviewer offered helpful tips for tweaking the picture to your liking. It has many combinations that should allow comfortable viewing for almost anyone willing to spend a few minutes getting to know the set.I have the sound run through a home theatre receiver and therefore cannot speak to TV speaker quality.I'm overall very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: What I like most? The design!
Reviews.Author: Fredrick
Reviews.Content: This Samsung TV costs less than some other TVs that use LED back lights. Its color accuracy, video processing, and bright-room picture are very good, and it has better screen uniformity than many edge-lit LED models.I especially liked the thin frame around the screen, and didn't mind the cabinet's extra thickness.It has lots of connections, including USB and HDMI ports, allowing me to easily hook up compatible devices and watch videos, play music, or view photos on the big screen.What I like most? The design!

Reviews.Title: Just set up
Reviews.Author: BudGiranimo
Reviews.Content: So far this picture looks amazing. It is not a Samsung SMART tv however. do not expect their apps to work. disappointed to realize that the connect share is not the same. other than that it is a clear picture and I am excited to upgrade for both TV and Xbox.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Nice TV
Reviews.Author: trock4190
Reviews.Content: This TV was a little outside of my price range, but luckily some well-timed gift money put it within reach.  I've only had it for a month or so, so I cannot speak to its longevity.  However, since it's a Samsung I'm told that likely will not be much of an issue.Here's what I can say:It was very simple to set up.  I did it on my own in my living room in about 20 minutes (although I didn't wall mount it or anything fancy like that).  It arrived intact, no damage or defects that I could detect.The picture is absolutely gorgeous.  I had an Insignia 32" 1080p LCD TV prior to this one and there is just no comparison.  TV was meant to be watched on a screen like this.  The LED backlight probably helps a ton, but the colors are vibrant and the contrast is superb.  One thing I will mention is that the 120Hz refresh rate definitely takes some getting used to.  At first everything looks like you're watching a soap opera, which can be a little unsettling.  It mostly just makes it look like what you're watching is actually in the room with you, like if you were watching real life through a window.
